name: Dracula Heat Wave
description:
"Dracula is still in threat!"

DRACULA HEAT WAVE: The 2011(?) Klik N' Play classic is back! Play as Renfield, Count Dracula's lowly servant, during a trying time for the vampire lord.

FEATURES:

  • Several endings!
  • Iconic soundtrack!
  • Inventory system!
  • Moral choices!

shoutouts to my buddy Max for still having a copy on his hard drive, making this rerelease possible!
